passage.title: Why do you help me?
passage.paragraph: Early in the moring, a great noise comes from the yard. Mr. Smith is cutting grass in the yard. Mr. Johnson goes to him and says, "Can I help you?"
"Yes, thank you very much," Mr. Smith says. "Do you often help people cut the grass?"
"No? Why do you get up so early and help me?"
"I help you cut the grass so that I can go back to sleep again."
